duas.title: Dua for Seeking Guidance
duas.description: A supplication to seek guidance and clarity.
duas.detail: O Allah, guide me to the straight path and grant me understanding.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اهدني وسددني واجعلني هدى وهادياً

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Knowledge
duas.description: A supplication to seek knowledge and wisdom.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me knowledge that benefits and make me among those who are guided.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم ارزقني علمًا نافعًا واجعلني من الذين يهتدون

duas.title: Dua for Making Right Decisions
duas.description: A supplication to seek guidance in making the right decisions.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me the ability to make sound decisions and choose what is best for me.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أعني على اتخاذ القرارات الصائبة

duas.title: Dua for Clarity of Mind
duas.description: A supplication to seek clarity of mind and understanding.
duas.detail: O Allah, purify my heart and grant me clarity of mind to comprehend the truth.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم طهر قلبي وأفقه لي في الدين

duas.title: Dua for Enlightenment
duas.description: A supplication to seek enlightenment and spiritual guidance.
duas.detail: O Allah, enlighten my heart and grant me deep understanding of Your teachings.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم انير قلبي وألهمني فهم دينك

duas.title: Dua for Righteous Companions
duas.description: A supplication to seek righteous companions for guidance.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me righteous companions who will help me stay on the path of guidance.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اجعلني في حبك وحب من يحبك وحب عمل يقربني إلى حبك

duas.title: Dua for Divine Assistance
duas.description: A supplication seeking divine assistance and guidance.
duas.detail: O Allah, help me with Your guidance and support in every aspect of my life.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اعني بالهدى والتقى والعفاف والغنى

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Truth
duas.description: A supplication to seek the truth and be guided towards it.
duas.detail: O Allah, guide me to the truth and make the truth clear to me.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أرني الحق حقاً وارزقني اتباعه وأرني الباطل باطلاً وارزقني اجتنابه

duas.title: Dua for Strengthening Faith
duas.description: A supplication to seek strength and guidance in strengthening faith.
duas.detail: O Allah, strengthen my faith and help me stay steadfast on the right path.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم ثبت قلبي على دينك

duas.title: Dua for Seeking God's Pleasure
duas.description: A supplication to seek Allah's pleasure and guidance in all actions.
duas.detail: O Allah, guide me to actions that please You and make me among the righteous.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اهدني لما ترضاه مني واجعلني ممن يرضاك

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Divine Knowledge
duas.description: A supplication to seek divine knowledge and understanding.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me knowledge that brings me closer to You and benefits others.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم ارزقني علماً نافعاً وعملاً صالحاً

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Clarity of Purpose
duas.description: A supplication to seek clarity of purpose and guidance in life.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me clarity of purpose and guide me on the path that leads to success.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اجعلني مقصدًا مخلصًا لك واهدني إلى ما ينفعني

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Knowledge from the Quran
duas.description: A supplication to seek knowledge and guidance from the Quran.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me understanding of the Quran and make it a source of guidance for me.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اجعل القرآن ربيع قلبي ونور صدري وجلاء حزني وذهاب همي

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Wisdom in Decision Making
duas.description: A supplication to seek wisdom and guidance in making decisions.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me wisdom and insight to make the right choices in life.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أرني الأشياء كما هي عليه حقيقة ، واجعلني أرى الأشياء كما ترونها

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Clarity in Faith
duas.description: A supplication to seek clarity and firmness in faith.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me a clear and strong faith that remains steadfast in the face of challenges.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أعني على إكمال ديني وتمام نعمتك

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Divine Guidance in Career
duas.description: A supplication to seek Allah's guidance in choosing a career path.
duas.detail: O Allah, guide me towards a career that aligns with my skills and benefits me in this life and the Hereafter.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اهدني لما فيه خيري الدنيا والآخرة

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Guidance in Difficult Times
duas.description: A supplication to seek guidance and support during challenging situations.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me strength and guide me through the hardships I face in life.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اجعل لي في الأمرين خيراً

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Guidance in Parenting
duas.description: A supplication to seek guidance and wisdom in raising children.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me the wisdom and patience to raise my children in the best manner.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أعني على تربية أولادي في طاعتك وخدمة أمتك

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Spiritual Enlightenment
duas.description: A supplication to seek spiritual enlightenment and closeness to Allah.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me spiritual enlightenment and fill my heart with love for You.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اشرح صدري بالإيمان واجعل لي في أمري يسرًا

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Guidance in Marriage
duas.description: A supplication to seek Allah's guidance in choosing a righteous spouse.
duas.detail: O Allah, guide me in finding a spouse who will be a source of love, happiness, and righteousness.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اختر لي ممن ترضاه لي ويترضاه لي

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Difficult Times
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and strength during challenging situations.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and fortitude to endure the trials I face.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اجعلني صبورًا وثابتًا على البلاء

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Worship
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience in performing acts of worship.
duas.detail: O Allah, help me remain patient and steadfast in fulfilling my religious obligations.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أعني على ذكرك وشكرك وحسن عبادتك

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Seeking Knowledge
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience in the pursuit of knowledge.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and perseverance in seeking beneficial knowledge.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم ارزقني الصبر على طلب العلم

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Relationships
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and understanding in relationships.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and wisdom in dealing with others.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اجعلني حليمًا لينًا في أخلاقي

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Grief
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and solace during times of grief and loss.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and comfort in times of sorrow and grant me ease.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أجرني في مصيبتي واخلفني خيرًا منها

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Overcoming Challenges
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and strength in overcoming challenges.
duas.detail: O Allah, help me remain patient and resilient in the face of difficulties.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اصرف عني شر البلاء واجعل الأمور كلها خيرًا

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Fasting
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and strength during fasting.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and endurance in observing the fasts.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اعني على صيامي وقيامي

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Parenting
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and guidance in raising children.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and wisdom in nurturing my children.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أعني على تربية أولادي في طاعتك وخدمة أمتك

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Seeking Forgiveness
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience in seeking forgiveness from Allah.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and sincerity in seeking Your forgiveness.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اجعلني من التوابين واجعلني من المتطهرين

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Facing Adversity
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and strength in facing adversity.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and steadfastness when faced with adversity.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أعني على الشدائد والمحن وفتن الدنيا

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Temptation
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience in resisting temptations and avoiding sin.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and strength to stay away from temptations and sinful acts.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اعني على الجهاد في سبيلك وصبري على ما تبتليني به

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Anger
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and self-control during moments of anger.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and the ability to control my anger for Your sake.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اعصمني من الغضب والتشويش

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Sickness
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and healing during times of illness.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and cure me from all physical and spiritual ailments.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اشفني واشفِ مرضى المسلمين

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Financial Hardship
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and relief during times of financial difficulty.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and provide me with sustenance from Your abundant resources.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم رزقني من حيث لا أحتسب

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Loneliness
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and solace during moments of loneliness.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and fill my heart with Your love and companionship.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أنت صاحبي في السفر والحلم

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Trials and Tribulations
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and strength during times of trials and tribulations.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and steadfastness in the face of tests and hardships.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اجعلني مصبورًا لينًا في البلاء

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Temptation
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience in resisting temptations and avoiding sin.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and strength to stay away from temptations and sinful acts.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اعني على الجهاد في سبيلك وصبري على ما تبتليني به

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Anger
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and self-control during moments of anger.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and the ability to control my anger for Your sake.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اعصمني من الغضب والتشويش

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Sickness
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and healing during times of illness.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and cure me from all physical and spiritual ailments.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اشفني واشفِ مرضى المسلمين

duas.title: Dua for Patience in Times of Financial Hardship
duas.description: A supplication to seek patience and relief during times of financial difficulty.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me patience and provide me with sustenance from Your abundant resources.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم رزقني من حيث لا أحتسب

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah for one's sins.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me for my sins and have mercy upon me.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي وارحمني

duas.title: Dua for Repentance
duas.description: A supplication to seek sincere repentance and forgiveness from Allah.
duas.detail: O Allah, I repent to You and seek Your forgiveness for all my shortcomings.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أتوب إليك وأستغفرك من جميع ذنوبي

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Allah's Pardon
duas.description: A supplication to seek pardon and forgiveness from Allah.
duas.detail: O Allah, I seek Your pardon and forgiveness for my mistakes and transgressions.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أستغفرك من كل ذنب أذنبته وما لم أذنبه

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Prayer
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during prayers.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, and grant me goodness.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي، وارحمني، واهدني، وعافني، وارزقني

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness at Night
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during the night.
duas.detail: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and turn to You in repentance.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أستغفرك وأتوب إليك في هذه الليلة

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in the Last Portion of the Night
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah in the last portion of the night.
duas.detail: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness for my sins and mistakes in the last portion of this night.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أستغفرك عما تعلم وما لا تعلم من ذنبي في هذه الساعة

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness after Prayer
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah after completing the prayer.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, and accept my prayers.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي وارحمني واقبل صلاتي

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Remembrance of Allah
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during the remembrance of Allah.
duas.detail: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You while remembering You.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أستغفرك وأتوب إليك في ذكرك

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Prostration
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during prostration.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy on me in this prostration.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي وارحمني في سجدتي هذه

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness during Hajj or Umrah
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during the pilgrimage or Umrah.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me and accept my pilgrimage/Umrah.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي وتقبل مني في حجي/عمرتي

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Distress
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during times of distress and difficulty.
duas.detail: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and relief from all distress and hardship.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أستغفرك وأستغيثك في كل مشكلة

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Doubt
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during times of doubt and uncertainty.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me and remove any doubts and uncertainties from my heart.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي واطرد عن قلبي الشكوك

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Forgetfulness
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah for forgetfulness and lapses in remembrance.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me for my forgetfulness and grant me a steadfast remembrance of You.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي ما أسررت وما أعلنت

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Negligence
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah for negligence and heedlessness.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me for my negligence and grant me attentiveness in my worship.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي ما قدمت وما أخرت

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Arrogance
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah for arrogance and pride.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me for my arrogance and grant me humility and modesty.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي ذنبي وجهلي وإسرافي في أمري

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Wrongdoing
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah for any wrongdoing and injustice.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me for any wrongdoing or injustice I have committed against myself or others.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي ظلمي وجهلي وإسرافي في أمري

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Weakness
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during times of weakness and vulnerability.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me and strengthen me during my times of weakness and vulnerability.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي في ضعفي واسترني في قلة حيلتي

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Temptation
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during times of temptation and desires.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me and protect me from the temptations and desires of this world.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي ما أنت أعلم به مني، وما أنا أعلم به من نفسي

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Regret
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during times of regret and remorse.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me for my past mistakes and help me rectify my actions.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي ذنبي الذي لا يغفره إلا أنت

duas.title: Dua for Seeking Forgiveness in Times of Failure
duas.description: A supplication to seek forgiveness from Allah during times of failure and disappointment.
duas.detail: O Allah, forgive me for my failures and grant me success in both this life and the Hereafter.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم اغفر لي، وتب عليّ، إنك أنت التواب الرحيم

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Illness
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from illness and diseases.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from all illnesses and grant me good health.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من البرص والجنون والجذام ومن سيئ الأسقام

duas.title: Dua for Healing
duas.description: A supplication to seek healing for any sickness or ailment.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me healing and cure from all illnesses and ailments.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم رب الناس، مذهب البأس، اشف أنت الشافي، لا شفاء إلا شفاؤك

duas.title: Dua for Strength and Well-being
duas.description: A supplication to seek strength and well-being in body and mind.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me strength and well-being in my body, mind, and soul.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أعني على ذكرك وشكرك وحسن عبادتك

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harmful Environments
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from harmful environments and diseases.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from harmful environments and keep me safe from diseases.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، وأعوذ بك من العجز والكسل، وأعوذ بك من الجبن والبخل، وأعوذ بك من غلبة الدين وقهر الرجال

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Eye
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from the evil eye and its harmful effects.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the evil eye and the envy of others.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم بارك لي فيما أعطيت، وقني عذابك واحفظني من شر ما قضيت

duas.title: Dua for Strengthening the Immune System
duas.description: A supplication to seek a strong and healthy immune system.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me a strong and healthy immune system to ward off diseases.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم بسط علينا من بركاتك، وارحمنا برحمتك، وزدنا من فضلك

duas.title: Dua for Relief from Pain and Discomfort
duas.description: A supplication to seek relief from any physical pain or discomfort.
duas.detail: O Allah, relieve me from all forms of pain and discomfort in my body.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم رب الناس، أذهب البأس، واشف، أنت الشافي، لا شفاء إلا شفاؤك

duas.title: Dua for Sound Sleep and Rest
duas.description: A supplication to seek a peaceful and restful sleep.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me sound sleep and rest that rejuvenates my body and mind.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم بسمك أحيا وبك أموت وإليك المصير

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Mental Stress and Anxiety
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from mental stress and anxiety.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from mental stress and anxiety and grant me peace of mind.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وضلع الدين وغلبة الرجال

duas.title: Dua for Long and Healthy Life
duas.description: A supplication to seek a long and healthy life filled with blessings.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me a long and healthy life in obedience to You.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم أعني على ذكرك وشكرك وحسن عبادتك

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Accidents and Injuries
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from accidents and injuries.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from accidents and injuries and keep me safe at all times.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم احفظنا من بين أيدينا ومن خلفنا وعن يمينا وعن شمالنا ومن فوقنا

duas.title: Dua for Ease in Daily Activities
duas.description: A supplication to seek ease and facilitation in daily activities.
duas.detail: O Allah, make my daily activities easy and grant me ease in everything I do.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم يسر لي أمري واجعله في أمري يسراً

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Mental and Physical Fatigue
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from mental and physical fatigue.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from mental and physical fatigue and grant me strength.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وضلع الدين وغلبة الرجال

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harmful Habits
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from harmful habits and addictions.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from harmful habits and grant me the strength to overcome them.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الخبث والخبائث

duas.title: Dua for Mental and Emotional Well-being
duas.description: A supplication to seek mental and emotional well-being.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me mental and emotional well-being and protect me from distress.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وضلع الدين وغلبة الرجال

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harmful Food and Drinks
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from harmful food and drinks.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from consuming harmful food and drinks and keep me healthy.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم بارك لنا فيما رزقتنا وقنا عذابك

duas.title: Dua for Healing from Chronic Illness
duas.description: A supplication to seek healing from chronic illnesses.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me complete healing and cure from my chronic illness.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم رب الناس، أذهب البأس، واشف، أنت الشافي، لا شفاء إلا شفاؤك

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Harmful Airborne Diseases
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from harmful airborne diseases.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from harmful airborne diseases and keep me safe.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من البرص والجنون والجذام ومن سيئ الأسقام

duas.title: Dua for Recovery from Surgery
duas.description: A supplication to seek recovery and healing after a surgery.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me a swift and complete recovery from my surgery.
duas.dua_arabic: بسم الله، أعوذ بالله من الشيطان الرجيم، اللهم رب الناس، أذهب البأس، واشف، أنت الشافي، لا شفاء إلا شفاؤك

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Allergies
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from allergies and their harmful effects.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from allergies and their harmful effects on my health.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من البرص والجنون والجذام ومن سيئ الأسقام

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Life
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and satisfaction in life.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and satisfaction with Your decree.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Gratitude and Thankfulness
duas.description: A supplication to express gratitude and thankfulness to Allah.
duas.detail: O Allah, I am grateful for all the blessings You have bestowed upon me.
duas.dua_arabic: الحمد لله

duas.title: Dua for Acceptance of Allah's Decree
duas.description: A supplication to seek acceptance of Allah's decree and find contentment in it.
duas.detail: O Allah, help me accept Your decree and find contentment in Your plan for me.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Difficult Times
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment during difficult and challenging times.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and patience during times of difficulty.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Finding Peace and Tranquility
duas.description: A supplication to seek peace and tranquility in life.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me inner peace and tranquility in my heart and soul.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وضلع الدين وغلبة الرجال

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Wealth
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and gratitude in wealth and provisions.
duas.detail: O Allah, bless me with contentment and gratitude in the wealth You have provided.
duas.dua_arabic: الحمد لله

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Relationships
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and harmony in relationships.
duas.detail: O Allah, bless my relationships with contentment, love, and understanding.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Worship
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and satisfaction in acts of worship.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and satisfaction in worshipping You alone.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Difficult Decisions
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and guidance in making difficult decisions.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and guide me in making the right decisions.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Solitude
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and peace in solitude and seclusion.
duas.detail: O Allah, bless me with contentment and tranquility in moments of solitude.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وضلع الدين وغلبة الرجال

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Success
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and gratitude in success and achievements.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and gratitude in the success You have granted me.
duas.dua_arabic: الحمد لله

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Failure
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and patience in times of failure and setbacks.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and patience in the face of failure and setbacks.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Trials and Tribulations
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and strength during trials and tribulations.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and strength to endure trials and tribulations.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Loss
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and acceptance in times of loss and bereavement.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and acceptance in times of loss and grief.
duas.dua_arabic: إِنَّا لِلّهِ وَإِنَّـا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعونَ

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Hardship
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and relief during times of hardship and adversity.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and ease during times of hardship and adversity.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وضلع الدين وغلبة الرجال

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Disappointment
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and acceptance when faced with disappointment.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and acceptance when my expectations are not met.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Uncertainty
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and trust in Allah during times of uncertainty.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and trust in Your plan during times of uncertainty.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن، والعجز والكسل، والجبن والبخل، وضلع الدين وغلبة الرجال

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Envy
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and protection from envy and jealousy.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from envy and grant me contentment with what You have blessed me.
duas.dua_arabic: الحمد لله

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in Comparison
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and avoid the harm of comparison with others.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and save me from the harm of comparing myself to others.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من زوال نعمتك، وتحول عافيتك، وفجاءة نقمتك، وجميع سخطك

duas.title: Dua for Contentment in the Hereafter
duas.description: A supplication to seek contentment and eternal bliss in the Hereafter.
duas.detail: O Allah, grant me contentment and a place in Paradise in the Hereafter.
duas.dua_arabic: اللهم إني أسألك الجنة وما قرب إليها من قول أو عمل

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from evil and harm.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the evils of the world and the whisperings of Shaytan.
duas.dua_arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Envy
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from envy and the evil eye.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the envy and the evil eye of others.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Accidents
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from accidents and calamities.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from accidents and keep me safe from harm.
duas.dua_arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Illness
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from illnesses and diseases.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from illnesses and keep me in good health.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبَرَصِ، وَالْجُنُونِ، وَالْجُذَامِ، وَمِنْ سَيِّئِ الأَسْقَامِ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Eye
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from the evil eye.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the evil eye and its harmful effects.
duas.dua_arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ، وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Fire
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from fire and its harm.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from fire and keep me safe from its harm.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَجِرْنِي مِنَ النَّارِ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Sins
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from sins and wrongdoing.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from sins and keep me on the straight path.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ لَا يَنْفَعُ، وَمِنْ قَلْبٍ لَا يَخْشَعُ، وَمِنْ نَفْسٍ لَا تَشْبَعُ، وَمِنْ دَعْوَةٍ لَا يُسْتَجَابُ لَهَا

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Thoughts
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from evil thoughts and whispers.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from evil thoughts and whispers of Shaytan.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Theft
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from theft and robbery.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from theft and keep my belongings safe.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِك َ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Disasters
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from disasters and calamities.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from disasters and keep me safe from harm.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْبَرَصِ، وَالْجُنُونِ، وَالْجُذَامِ، وَمِنْ سَيِّئِ الأَسْقَامِ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Company
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from evil company and bad influences.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the company of those who lead me astray.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِي الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرَتِي الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَادِي، وَاجْعَلِ الْحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ، وَاجْعَلِ الْمَوْتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Jinn
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from evil jinn and their harm.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the mischief of the evil jinn.
duas.dua_arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Magic
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from magic and its effects.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the harm of magic and its effects.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Dreams
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from evil dreams and nightmares.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from evil dreams and nightmares.
duas.dua_arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِه ِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Shirk
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from associating partners with Allah (shirk).
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from committing shirk and keep me steadfast on monotheism.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شِرْكٍ أَنْ أَظْلِمَ أُحَدًا وَأَعْلَمَ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Speech
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from engaging in evil speech.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from engaging in backbiting, gossip, and harmful speech.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكُفْرِ، وَالْفَقْرِ، وَاللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Evil Deeds
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from engaging in evil deeds and actions.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from engaging in evil deeds and actions.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِي الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرَتِي الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَادِي، وَاجْعَلِ الْحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ، وَاجْعَلِ الْمَوْتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Envy
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from the evil eye and envy.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the evil eye and the envy of others.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Bad Companions
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from bad companions and their negative influence.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from the companionship of those who lead me astray.
duas.dua_arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي نِيَّتِي وَعَمَلِي، وَاجْعَلْهُ لِي خَيْرًا مِنْ مَا يَتَوَقَّعُ

duas.title: Dua for Protection from Accidents
duas.description: A supplication to seek protection from accidents and mishaps.
duas.detail: O Allah, protect me from accidents and keep me safe from harm.
duas.dua_arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
